tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read that can trigger a panic. An attacker can exploit this by sending specially crafted requests, resulting in a denial of service.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `moxcms` library to the patch version or turn off overflow checking.
